ictam.name: ICTAM
ictam.description: ICT Association of Malawi - Host organization for the 2025 AGM and Innovation Awards
ictam.about: The ICT Association of Malawi (ICTAM) is an umbrella body of all ICT professionals in Malawi. Our mission is to offer ICT leadership by catalyzing policy changes and by supporting related developments aimed at enabling Malawians to participate effectively in the modern technology-based global economy, benefiting the Nation and its partners.

sponsorLogos.name: FCB
sponsorLogos.description: Full-service commercial bank offering comprehensive financial products and services across Malawi
sponsorLogos.about: First Capital Bank Malawi is a full-service commercial bank offering financial products and services to the corporate, retail and personal markets. With its diverse product offering, First Capital Bank caters to the needs of all segments of the Malawi market and has one of the most extensive branches and agency distribution networks in the country.

sponsorLogos.name: MTL
sponsorLogos.description: Leading telecommunications provider offering integrated voice and data solutions nationwide
sponsorLogos.about: Malawi Telecommunications Limited provides integrated high quality communication solutions for customers' greater experience. MTL has nationwide footprint on both Voice and Data services, offering dedicated solutions for residential and business customers.

businessSolutions.vpn: BusinessCONNECT - Dedicated Virtual Private Network (VPN) solution for secure data and voice transmission between branches
businessSolutions.voice: Corporate Voice with competitive call rates and per-second billing for SMEs and Corporates
businessSolutions.hosting: Office 365 email and suite hosting services

sponsorLogos.name: Click Mobile
sponsorLogos.description: Pan-African telecommunications company specializing in messaging, USSD, voice, and enterprise solutions
sponsorLogos.about: Click Mobile is a Malawi-based telecommunications company that focuses on Messaging, USSD, Voice, and Airtime. Founded in 2012, the company has grown to establish over 8 branches across Africa and the Middle East, offering Enterprise products that allow customers to consume telecommunication services.

awards.award: Africa CXO Award of the Year
Outstanding Performance Telco Team Honors Award

leadership.ceoBio: Founder and CEO, 2022 CXO of the Year Award winner, ranked #7 in Rocco Awards, leading telco male professional 2024 at Antonio Meucci Awards

sponsorLogos.name: Castel
sponsorLogos.description: Leading beverage manufacturing company producing high-quality alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks
sponsorLogos.about: Castel Malawi Limited is the leading beverage manufacturing company dedicated to producing high-quality alcoholic drinks for the Malawian market. As a subsidiary of the globally recognised Castel Group, we bring decades of expertise in brewing, bottling, and distribution. For over 50 years, Castel Malawi has supplied the Malawi market with global brands.

sponsorLogos.name: Oranux
sponsorLogos.description: Prominent Malawian ICT services and solutions provider specializing in IT infrastructure
sponsorLogos.about: Oranux Consulting Limited is a prominent Malawian based ICT Services and Solutions provider specializing in cost effective consulting services in the areas of IT infrastructure design, implementation and support.

location.address: 1st Floor, Dossani House, Room 12, 17 Glyn Jones Road

leadership.qualifications: BSc in Computing and Information Systems (Upper Second-Class Honours) - London Metropolitan University

projectExperience: Reserve Bank of Malawi ICT Hardware Procurement

sponsorLogos.name: HESLGB
sponsorLogos.fullName: Higher Education Students' Loans and Grants Board
sponsorLogos.description: Government board financing access to higher education for needy and deserving students in Malawi
sponsorLogos.about: HESLGB was established to sustainably provide accessible and affordable loans and grants to deserving students pursuing higher education in Malawi. The Board disburses loans yearly to needy and deserving students pursuing higher education in government registered higher learning institutions.
sponsorLogos.mission: To sustainably provide accessible and affordable loans and grants to deserving students pursuing higher education in Malawi
mandate: Disburse loans to needy and deserving students
Support students in NCHE registered institutions
Manage historical loans dating back to 1985/86
sponsorLogos.eligibility: Needy and deserving students in government registered higher learning institutions (by National Council for Higher Education - NCHE)
sponsorLogos.historicalContext: Manages loan scheme dating back to 1985/86 academic calendar

organizer.title: Event Organizer
organizer.description: The organizing body for the 2025 ICTAM AGM and Innovation Awards
